p: After 28 days of extract administration at 400 mg/kg and 2000 mg/kg body weight ( Figure 4). Vital organs such as liver, kidney, and spleen were weighed. The results showed no alteration of the organ relative weight compared to the control group ( p > 0.05). This result could confirm the safety of W. frutescens extract with oral administration up to 2000 mg/kg since the modification of the organ relative weight can be induced by toxic substances [ 24].
